title: Biden Accuses Oil Companies of ‘War Profiteering’ and Threatens Windfall Tax
description: The president has been eager to redirect public anger over gas prices as Democrats try to keep power in Congress in the midterm elections.
dc:creator: Peter Baker and Clifford Krauss
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden lashed out against the major gas and oil companies on Monday as several of them reported another surge in profits.
